es.description-pc: Capacitacion y practicas sobre reparacion, mantenimiento, instalacion de hardware y software. Incluy√≥ diagn√≥stico de problemas, ensamblaje de computadoras y optimizaci√≥n de sistemas, desarrollando habilidades esenciales para el soporte t√©cnico y la atenci√≥n al cliente.

es.text-about-me-2: Mi objetivo es convertirme en un profesional fullstack. Disfruto cada nuevo aprendizaje y valoro profundamente el apoyo de esta incre√≠ble comunidad. es.description-project-1: Alinks es una aplicaci√≥n web desarrollada con React y Firebase que permite a los usuarios registrarse, gestionar sus propios enlaces y compartir un perfil p√∫blico con sus links destacados. Utiliza Firebase Authentication para el login con autorregistro, Firestore para el almacenamiento de datos, React Router DOM para la navegaci√≥n, protegida basada en el estado de autenticaci√≥n.
es.description-project-2: Aplicacion web que permite buscar una ciudad y consultar su clima actual, el pron√≥stico diario y por hora. B√∫squeda de ciudades con autocompletado y debounce utilizando un trie creado a partir de un json local de ciudades comunes. Customhook para obtener y formatear datos meteorol√≥gicos por nombre de ciudad llamando a API's, utiliza useCallback.
es.description-project-3: Aplicaci√≥n CLI para gestionar tareas, desarrollada en Node.js y conectada a una base de datos MongoDB. Permite realizar operaciones CRUD (crear, leer, actualizar y eliminar) desde la terminal. Utiliza commander para el manejo de comandos, inquirer para entradas interactivas del usuario, picocolors y chalk para mejorar la visualizaci√≥n con estilos y colores en la consola.
es.description-project-4: Aplicaci√≥n web para gestionar tareas. Permite agregar tareas con t√≠tulo, descripci√≥n, fecha l√≠mite y prioridad; marcarlas como completadas, editarlas, eliminarlas y filtrarlas por prioridad. Persistencia automatica mediante localStorage. Utiliza un custom hook que combina useReducer con localStorage para manejar el estado, useContext para acceso global, useEffect para sincronizaci√≥n y useRef para referencias en formularios.

en.web: Web developer from Buenos Aires, Argentina
en.name: Aaron Cuellar
en.p-inicio: Passionate about technology, science and knowledge.
en.description-carrer: Degree offered by FCEN - UBA. So far I have acquired knowledge about algorithms, data structures, algorithmic complexities, program specification, low-level computer operation, as well as mathematical and theoretical foundations related to computing. In addition to technical knowledge, I have strengthened skills such as teamwork, efficient time management and perseverance.
en.description-ingles: Elementary English training provided by the Faculty of Exact and Natural Sciences of the University of Buenos Aires. This course reinforces basic skills in reading comprehension, writing and oral communication.
en.description-pc: Training and practices on repair, maintenance, hardware and software installation. It included diagnosis of problems, computer assembly and system optimization, developing essential skills for technical support and customer service.
en.description-colegio: Secondary education with a focus on Economics, which included training in administration, accounting and basic economic principles, strengthening skills such as organization and creativity.
en.text-about-me-1: Hello! How are you? Let me tell you a little about myself. I am 21 years old and I live in Buenos Aires, Argentina. I am currently studying the degree in Computer Science, while at the same time I am training as a web developer.
en.text-about-me-2: My objetive is to become a fullstack professional. I enjoy every new learning and deeply value the support of this incredible community. I am a person who loves to face new challenges and who feels prepared to add value to the technology industry.üë®‚Äçüíºüíª
en.text-contact: Do not hesitate to contact me by writing to any of my social networks or sending me an email. I hope to connect with you and explore opportunities together! üìûüöÄ
en.description-project-1: Alinks is a web application built with React and Firebase that allows users to register, manage their personal links, and share a public profile with their featured links. It uses Firebase Authentication for sign-up and login, Firestore for data storage, and React Router DOM for navigation, which is protected based on the authentication state.
en.description-project-2: A web application that allows users to search for a city and check its current weather, daily forecast, and hourly forecast. City search includes autocomplete and debounce using a trie built from a local JSON file of common cities. A custom hook is used to fetch and format weather data by city name, calling APIs and utilizing useCallback.
en.description-project-3: A CLI application for managing tasks, developed in Node.js and connected to a MongoDB database. It allows performing CRUD operations (create, read, update, and delete) from the terminal. It uses commander for command handling, inquirer for interactive user inputs, and picocolors and chalk for enhancing visualization with styles and colors in the console.
en.description-project-4: Web application for managing tasks. It allows you to add tasks with a title, description, due date, and priority; mark them as completed, edit, delete, and filter them by priority. Data is automatically saved to localStorage to preserve tasks between sessions. It uses a custom hook that combines useReducer with localStorage to manage state, useContext for global access, useEffect for synchronization, and useRef for handling form references.
